name: Kyndon
description:
Kyndon is a game about a community, and how you can make a difference in yours. Made for the Brackeys Game Jam, this in-progress game features art made by Pixelator Gadzy (Twitter), and was programmed by Dylandummy (AKA Dylan Tuten).

Icon created by https://i-do-unity-code.itch.io, sound effects by https://chickenblazer356.itch.io.
